text: visvasavantayini! obata punarjivaya laba dima desata (deva dutaya vana) ohu, obava aradhana kalahot allahtada, (ohuge) dutayatada pilituru denu. niyata vasayenma allah minisunvada, ohuge hrdayada vatakara gena ætteya yannada, niyata vasayenma oba ohu vetama (gena enu læba) ekarasi karanu labannehuya yannada, oba sthira vasayen dæna ganu
